channel.title: pushdown systems on Johannes Späth
channel.description: Recent content in pushdown systems on Johannes Späth

item.title: Synchronized Pushdown Systems
item.description: Synchronized Pushdown Systems (SPDS) are a recently development for efficient and precise data-flow analysis. SPDS relies on two pushdown systems, one system models field-sensitivity, the other one context-sensitivity. The results of both systems are then synchronized and yield a field- and context-sensitive data-flow analysis. The implementation of SPDS is found here: https://github.com/CROSSINGTUD/WPDS
